name: Navus
description:
When experienced and motivated people meets, amazing things can happen. We are team, which provides creative IT solutions. We are driven by beautiful websites, e-commerce solutions and money saving Business management systems. We are trusted by more that 500 happy customers worldwide, and we have a strict and a principled approach to all projects. 
When we work with our clients, we not only want to deliver a final result, but we are seeking a success of the client project. This approach has gained us a trust and returning customers for new projects.
We are building projects using Agile management method, which ensures profesional project management from the idea to a final product. We love what we do, we do what we love.
Navus - Driven by Creativity!
